Text: Hello! Is that guide located anywhere else? THe URL provided dosen't seem to work. I already have a semicomplete collection of n64, GB, GBA, GBC, NES, and SNES, but if you don't still have the guide I could just redownload completely.

@cotmiester:
You can try a snapshot from archive.org:

http://wayback.archive.org/web/*/http://mametitles.co.uk/tz/torrentzip.pdf

However, using torrentzip is not that complicated. I'm sure you can find the info you need by googling.
